name: prompt-templates
description: Structured prompt templates with variable substitution and chaining

ai.summary: Reusable prompt templates with variable substitution and chaining for LLM workflows.
capabilities: Render system/user message pairs with named placeholders
Chain prompts so one response feeds into the next
Built-in templates for code review, summarization, structured extraction, and chain-of-thought
ai.usage:
from aigogo.prompt_templates import CODE_REVIEW, CHAIN_OF_THOUGHT
messages = CODE_REVIEW.render(language='python', code='def foo(): pass')
messages = CHAIN_OF_THOUGHT.render(question='Why is the sky blue?')
ai.outputs: List of message dicts with 'role' and 'content' keys, ready for LLM API calls
